items.sentence: Tom asked Mary to sell him the guitar she'd inherited from her grandfather.
As soon as it started raining, Tom realized he'd left his umbrella at home.
I don't think you need to tell Tom what Mary said that she was going to do.
Tom apparently hasn't yet told Mary that he isn't going to be at her party.
Every time I think about what happened to Tom, I feel sad and start crying.
You'll need to speak in French if you want this audience to understand you.
Tom's acknowledgement that he stole the ring cleared the maid of suspicion.
I see no reason that we have to wait until Tom gets here to start drinking.
Just because someone's smiling doesn't necessarily mean that they're happy.
Because of the traffic jam, it took us thirty minutes to cross that bridge.
